sense.name: develop or introduce industry to an area
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 INDUSTRIALIZE NP2[location] Note: Watch to tag adjectival uses as 'X'.
sense.examples: Stalin industrialized the USSR. The big concern of the Pit River Tribe is that this project would industrialize the area. Some fear that the wind power project will industrialize their rural landscape. What would have happened if the North had not industrialized?

sense.name: change production to an industrial process
sense.examples: SEVABM industrialized the manufacturing of TEL spinners. Cinema technology industrialized the entertainment industry.
